data: Base foo calls Base boo via $[Base:foo,Base:boo]
Base goo calls Base foo via $[Base:goo,Base:foo]
Base goo calls Base boo via $[Base:goo,Base:foo,Base:boo]
Base goo calls Base1 foo via $[Base:goo,Base1:foo]
Base goo calls Base1 moo via $[Base:goo,Base1:foo,Base1:moo]
Base1 foo calls Base1 moo via $[Base1:foo,Base1:moo]

Child doo calls Base1 moo via $[Child:doo,Base1:foo,Base1:moo]
